Re @Vanguard_Group doesn’t realise that most bitcoiners are bordering on fanaticism. I for one will boycott vanguard for the rest of my life over this, and make sure I’ll advise everyone in my network to do the same.
Eleanor Terrett: 🚨NEW: @Vanguard_Group, the world’s second largest asset manager behind @BlackRock, is reportedly blocking its customers from buying into the new $BTC Spot ETFs, saying the products “don’t fit with Vanguard’s investment philosophy.” Now we’ll start to see how institutional…

entry.summary: RT _Checkɱate 🔑⚡🌋☢️🛢️ On the Price multiplier effect for #Bitcoin, we can look at how much capital flows into the Realized Cap per unit change in Market cap. entry.title: With Privacy as an emerging primitive keep an eye on @silentdao_ in 2024
entry.summary:
With Privacy as an emerging primitive keep an eye on @silentdao_ in 2024
Crypto, Distilled: $ETH killers were the sweetest fruit of 2021. 2024’s golden goose could be very different. Emerging Primitives: - Autonomous Economic Agents (AEAs) - AiDeFi (+ other DeAi verticals) - DePIN (storage, GPU, etc.) - Privacy-Enabled Infrastructure - Modular Blockchains + DA -…
